alert.note: Alert for Chilton; Coosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:28PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Chilton and southwestern Coosa Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gap Of The Mountain, or near Clanton, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clanton, Jemison, Thorsby, Billingsley, Plecher, Mitchell Lake, Gap Of The Mountain, Lay Lake Dam, Higgins Ferry Park, Verbena, Pooles Crossroads, Lay Lake, Lomax, I 65 Rest Area, Mitchell Dam and Cooper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
